item.title: Jimmy Kimmel, Elizabeth Warren, Ben Stiller React With Shock Over CBS’ Decision to End ‘Late Show’: “F*** You and All Your Sheldons CBS”
item.description: Prominent political figures as well as Hollywood stars have reacted with disgust over the news that ‘The Late Show With Stephen Colbert’ will end its run in 2026.

item.title: Jimmy Kimmel, Elizabeth Warren, Ben Stiller React With Shock Over CBS’ Decision to End ‘Late Show’: “F*** You and All Your Sheldons CBS”
item.description: Prominent political figures as well as Hollywood stars have reacted with disgust over the news that ‘The Late Show With Stephen Colbert’ will end its run in 2026.

item.title: Critic’s Notebook: The Awful Optics of CBS Canceling ‘The Late Show With Stephen Colbert’
item.description: Does the end of Colbert’s show in May 2026 relate to the Paramount-Skydance merger? To Colbert’s criticism of Donald Trump? To the demise of late night television? Who’s to say?

item.title: Critic’s Notebook: The Awful Optics of CBS Canceling ‘The Late Show With Stephen Colbert’
item.description: Does the end of Colbert’s show in May 2026 relate to the Paramount-Skydance merger? To Colbert’s criticism of Donald Trump? To the demise of late night television? Who’s to say?

item.title: ‘Late Show’ Shocker: CBS Ending Late-Night Franchise in 2026
item.description: Host Stephen Colbert announced the news during the taping of Thursday’s show.

item.title: Joaquin Phoenix Explains Reason Behind That Awkward ‘Late Show With David Letterman’ Interview
item.description: The actor was promoting the mockumentary ‘I’m Still Here’ when he delivered one of the strangest interviews ever recorded for late-night television.

item.title: Emmys: ‘Daily Show,’ ‘Jimmy Kimmel Live!,’ ‘Late Show’ Nominated in Shrunken Talk Series Field
item.description: The category has only three nominees, down from four in 2024 and five the year before that.
